title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick show, The Boston Globe's Ben Volin joins us to describe the scene at the NFL owners meetings and reacts to what Jim Irsay had to say about Daniel Snyder. DraftKings Sports Book Director of Operations Johnny Avello shares the hottest bets going into the NBA season. Warriors writer for the Athletic Anthony Slater discusses their depth. And Marcellus Wiley tells us a story about how players would get people past security while they were staying at hotels in the NFL. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
